org.xflatdb.xflat.convert.ConversionException

  • Packages that use ConversionException 
    Package Description
    org.xflatdb.xflat.convert
    This package contains the conversion interface exposed by XFlat.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.convert.converters
    This package contains basic converters implemented for common conversion types.

    • Uses of ConversionException in org.xflatdb.xflat.convert

      Subclasses of ConversionException in org.xflatdb.xflat.convert 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConversionNotSupportedException
      A subclass of ConversionException which indicates that the ConversionService.convert(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Class) method was called when the conversion was not supported.
